com.jun.juncw.ctrl

Class CartBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jun.juncw.ctrl.CartBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @Named(value="cartBean")
 @SessionScoped
public class CartBean
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Handles items in cart and displaying to user
    Author:
    Jun Chia
    See Also:
